text.text_translated: For a long time, people thought dreams were special. They thought dreams could tell the future. They believed dreams were messages from gods. These messages gave people important information. This still happens today. Many people remember a dream. They dream about a thing, a place, or a person. Then, later, the dream happens in real life.
